div.p: G75/10881, unit 816, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the
Quarter
end ing
Quarter ending deleted.
September& October 1875.

Total -
Fifty pounds --- shillings
and --- pence
